fixed original name - repeated supression of original name is of great concern

/* External links */ Moved tag to top of section to improve appearance

/* Sports */ If "many" have described the cricket team as "world class", it shouldn't be too hard to find a reference.
/* Demographics */ Clarified ancestry of [[Burgher]] people, corrected sentence on Muslims (last sentence of the section)
/* Current conflict */ Demoted to subsection of History, added NPOV tag

It is important to show how the word Sinhalese was derrived from: Sinha (Lion) + Hela to form Sinhela, then Sinhala then Singhalese
I think its important to mention the original name of the island - Heladiva, given to it by its indigenous people - the Hela (or Singha+Hela, Sinhela, sinhalese).
